queries.query: cold-dwelling fey creature that can breathe underwater and move on ice
queries.variant: fey creature that dwells in the cold, can breathe both in water and air, and moves effortlessly on ice

queries.query: manipulative hag known for its spells and cold damage immunity
queries.variant: spellcasting hag that uses manipulation and has immunity to cold damage

queries.query: medium fey with high strength and ice walking ability
queries.variant: fey that is medium-sized, has a strong strength score, and can walk on ice

queries.query: cunning hag that uses psychic attacks and can grapple opponents
queries.variant: devious hag that employs psychic abilities and can capture enemies by grappling

queries.query: merchant of ice who traps creatures in her parka and inflicts cold damage
queries.variant: ice-themed hag that stores creatures in her parka and deals cold damage to her foes
